start.title: Graphs of Dynamic Situations Virtual tool
start.p1: This tool is designed to help you to understand graphs of dynamic relationships. The tool does this by making it more transparent relationships with concrete examples in Virtual Reality and by providing targeted feedback on the graph have drawn yourself.
start.p2: This is a proof of concept, which only works with a single example of a dynamic context.

intro.p1: You are now going to draw a graph of a dynamic relationship. You can do this on the screen using a mouse, stylus or finger.
intro.p2: Once you are satisfied with your graph your hand it in. You will receive specific feedback on your work.

assignments.description: Imagine that this bottle is filled with water, whereby the water flows at a constant speed.
assignments.questions_li1: Sketch a graph in which you turn off the height of the water in the bottle compared to the amount of water in the bottle.
assignments.questions_li2: Explain how you arrived at your answer.
